title: Falkirk
name: The Kelpies
directions: From the Falkirk Wheel walk eastwards along the Forth and Clyde Canal for about 7km. Alternatively, if you are driving on the M9 close to Grangemouth and Falkirk, you can see the from the motorway
content: Two huge horse-head structures (about 30m high) made from steel and designed by Andy Scott in 2013.
